Name: Shareek Ahamed
AboutMe:
I have a passion for creating and enhancing anything technology related. When it comes to Programming, my ultimate goal is to make the world a better place. I'm a developer on the bleeding edge of technology

I want to enjoy the growth of my skills and talents among a team of dedicated artists and programmers producing commercial and industrial computer Technologies.

The primary technologies I use are PHP, Java and C# but programming is more about understanding the logic of process than the specific language you create it with.

I utilize and advocate web standards like CSS and XHTML as much as possible because I believe that they are dramatically changing the Internet. Not to mention they make my life, and the clients life, easier and less expensive.
